name: Hooligan James
description:
James, nicknamed "Hooligan James" has been living a life of crime in Lost Jersey for as long as he remembers. After an eventful club night, James got told about Richard Raps's disstrack. With his ego in pieces and a newly bought submachine gun, he goes on an adventure to get revenge and humiliate his opposition.

This game features a lively open world, a branching storyline, melee combat, shooting, driving and even shooting while driving!
